@font-face generator

 
  Font weight
  Font style
Leave the URL input empty if you do not have a specific font extension. 
<style>
@font-face {
	font-family: "{{ fontfamily }}";
	font-weight: {{ fontweight }};
	font-style: {{ fontstyle }};
	font-display: swap;
	src:		url("{{ urlEot }}") format("embedded-opentype"),		url("{{ urlTtf }}") format("truetype"),		url("{{ urlWoff }}") format("woff"),		url("{{ urlWoff2 }}") format("woff2")
}

:root {	--fontFamily: "{{ fontfamily }}";	--headingsFontFamily: "{{ fontfamily }}";	--logoFontFamily: "{{ fontfamily }}";}
</style>
 Copy and Paste the generated code inside your global-fonts.liquid file.
